from collections import *
for u in range(int(input())):
 n,k=list(map(int,input().split()))
 l=list(map(int,input().split()))
 d=[]
 x=100000000000000
 for i in range(n-1):
  for j in range(i+1,n):
   x=min(x,abs(l[i]+l[j]-k))
   d.append(abs(l[i]+l[j]-k))
 print(x,d.count(x))

t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 l=[]
 mi=99999999999
 n,m=list(map(int,input().split()))
 a=list(map(int,input().split()))
 for j in range(n-1):
  for k in range(j+1,n):
   a1=a[j]
   a2=a[k]
   b1=a1+a2-m
   b2=abs(b1)
   l.append(b2)
   if(mi>b2):
    mi=b2
    
 print(mi,l.count(mi))

# cook your dish here
t=int(input())
while t:
 n, k = [int (x) for x in input().split()]
 arr=[int(x) for x in input().split()]
 num=[[0 for i in range(n)] for j in range(n)]
 i=0
 j=0
 count=0
 while i<n:
  while j<n:
   num[i][j]=arr[i]+arr[j]
   j=j+1
  i=i+1 
  j=0
 min =1000000000000000
 i=0
 j=0
 while i<n:
  while j<n:
   if abs(num[i][j]-k)==min and i != j:
    count=count+1
   elif abs(num[i][j]-k)<=min and i !=j:
    min=abs(num[i][j]-k)
    count=1
   j=j+1
  i=i+1
  j=i
 print("{} {}".format(min,count))
 t=t-1

t=int(input())
while(t>0):
 n,k=map(int,input().split())
 l=list(map(int,input().split()))
 x=3*10**9
 a=[]
 for i in range(n):
  for j in range(i+1,n):
   a.append(abs(l[j]+l[i]-k))
 m=min(a)
 print(m,a.count(m))
 t-=1

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
 n, k = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
 arr = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
 list_diff = []
 for i in range(n):
  for j in range(i+1, n):
   list_diff.append(abs(arr[i]+arr[j]-k))
 m = min(list_diff)
 ans = list_diff.count(m)
 print(m, end=" ")
 print(ans)
